testcase.name: Scenario: Create new user
testcase.system-out: Given the admin user is logged in When the admin creates a new user with name "John Doe" Then the user should appear in the user list

testcase.name: Scenario: Update user details
testcase.system-out: Given a user "John Doe" exists When the admin updates the user email to "john.new@example.com" Then the user details should be updated

testcase.name: Scenario: Delete user
testcase.system-out: Given a user "John Doe" exists When the admin deletes the user Then the user should not appear in the user list
